item.title: Command Help

item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“lolboy396, post:6, topic:418400”]Thanks Dude i would rep if i know how

1 more thing when the players are done maxing and stuff a command to give them 100hp again
but they cant use it when fighting
& a ::stafflist command e.g like this but the older verson 317

[/quote]

Use the boolean “inCombat”.

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

if(command.startsWith("Test1")) {
if (currentHealth < 100)
{
     sM("You Must have 100 hp to use this command");
     return;
}
currentHealth = 5;
teleport();
}

Read full topic

its becuase im making a maxing area iv got the teleport all done its just the command

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Lol no.

Don’t get what you’re trying to do, but it should be similar to this.

if(command.startsWith("Test1")) {
if (playerHealth < 100)
     sM("You Must have 100 hp to use this command");
else
{
     playerLevel[3] = 100;
     currentHealth -= 95;
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @RB9 RB9
item.description:
@RB9 wrote:

It’s not totally clear what you’re trying to do with the command, but try these variations:

if(command.startsWith("Test1")) { sM("You Must have 100 hp to use this command"); }else{ playerLevel[3] = 100; currentHealth -= 95; }

Or

if(command.startsWith("Test1")) { sM("You Must have 100 hp to use this command"); else if playerLevel[3] = 100; currentHealth -= 95; }

Read full topic

else playerLevel[3] = 100;
currentHealth -= 95;
